dialogue.text: i just want to say, before this mod starts
thanks to everyone who helped get this mod recognized!
we worked EXTRA hard on this, we put our fuckin souls into it.
and to see it finally pay off is satisfying to say the least
without futher ado, enjoy the Vs Spider-Man:\nNo Way Home Update!!
also Marvel and Disney, please don't sue us. We aren't making any profit from this
Most of all, Thank you Stan Lee and Marvel, for giving us such amazing hero's and villains
this mod wouldn't have been made without them!
Rest in peace the legend, Stan Lee.
